string.value: #b#p9110002##k is responsible for taking care of a small altar over in Mushroom Shrine. She seems to be concerned about something...

Tired of cleaning up after those pesky #o9400000#s, #p9110002# wants me to gather #b100 #t4000064#s#k. I'd hate to see the #m800000000# covered in filth, so I've decided to help her. Time to pluck some #t4000064#s!\n\n#t4000064# #b#c4000064#/100
I gave #p9110002# a whole bunch of #t4000064#s. It felt good seeing her being ecstatic over a bunch of #p9110002#s. Hopefully this will restore #m800000000#'s beauty...
아아... 아무리 청소를 해도 도무지 깨끗해지지가 않잖아! 아, 이런. 안녕하세요? 손님에게 이런 모습을 보여 드리다니. ...부끄러워라.
죄송해요. 사실 요새 신사 주변에 #o9400000#들이 너무 많아져서 곤란해하고 있었거든요. 아름다운 벚꽃으로 유명한 #m800000000#가 지저분해지고 있어서 무척 안타까워요. 조금이라도 깨끗해 보이려고 열심히 청소는 하는데, 아무리 쓸어도 소용이 없네요... 죄송하지만 혹시 여유가 있으시다면 같이 #t4000064#을 청소해 주시겠어요?
같이 청소해 주시겠다니... 당신은 정말 좋은 분이시로군요! 그럼, #t4000064#을 100개 정도만 모아서 가져다 주세요. 그 후의 처리는 제가 알아서 할 테니까요. 그럼 부탁 드려요.
네... 많이 바쁘신 모양이죠? 그렇다면 하는 수 없죠... 어떻게 하면 #m800000000#를 더 깨끗이 청소할 수 있을까...
My goodness... I've been sweeping and sweeping, and it's still dirty around here! Arghh! Oh, hello there... well, that was embarassing...

I'm sorry about that. The thing is, lately there have been so many #o9400000#s near the shrine, and they are causing the world-renowned #m800000000# to lose its beauty and be covered in filth. It's really sad to see. I'm sorry to ask this to a complete stranger, but if you have any time, will you help me clean #b#t4000064##k up?

You're really going to help me? Wow ... you're awesome! Well, okay. What do I need to really clean this place up... oh, I know! Okay, I'll need #b100 #t4000064#s#k from you. Please gather them up for me, and I'll take care of the rest. I'll be waiting~
Ok, you must be really busy - I understand. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to figure out a way to clean up the #m800000000# even better than last time...
Wow, you must have gathered up all the #t4000064#s!
Awesome! This is such a big help for me! Now that we're cleaning up #t4000064#, I'm sure the shrine will look a little nicer than it does right now. Thank you so much for your help.
I don't think you have many #b#t4000064#s#k yet. We'll need more feathers if we are to really clean up #m800000000#.
